alert.note: Alert for Burnett (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 2:34AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pine and southwestern Burnett Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 233 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grasston, or 7 miles southwest of Pine City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rock Creek around 240 AM CDT. Pine City around 245 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
